com.almasb.fxgl.gameplay

Class SaveLoadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.gameplay.SaveLoadManager

  • public final class SaveLoadManager
extends Object
    Convenient access to saving and loading game data.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

      • saveFiles

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<SaveFile> saveFiles()
        Returns:
        read only view of observable save files

      • querySaveFiles

        public void querySaveFiles()
        Asynchronously (with a progress dialog) loads save files into observable list saveFiles().

      • saveTask

        public com.almasb.easyio.IOTask<Void> saveTask(DataFile dataFile,
                                               SaveFile saveFile)
        Save serializable data onto a disk file system under saves directory, which is created if necessary in the directory where the game is run from.

        All extra directories will also be created if necessary.

        Parameters:
        dataFile - data file
        saveFile - save file
        Returns:
        io task

      • saveProfileTask

        public com.almasb.easyio.IOTask<Void> saveProfileTask(UserProfile profile)
        Saves user profile to "profiles/". Creates "saves/" in that directory.
        Parameters:
        profile - the profile to save
        Returns:
        io task

      • loadTask

        public com.almasb.easyio.IOTask<DataFile> loadTask(SaveFile saveFile)
        Load serializable data from external file on disk file system from saves directory which is in the directory where the game is run from.
        Parameters:
        saveFile - save file to load
        Returns:
        io task
